mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERSHIP(MID, MPASSWORD, MNAME, MNUMBER, MEMAIL, MDOMAIN, MADDRESSNUMBER, MROADADDRESS, MLANDADDRESS, MDATAILEDADDRESS, MNOTE) VALUES (#{mid},#{mpassword},#{mname},#{mnumber},#{memail},#{mdomain},#{maddressnumber},#{mroadaddress},#{mlandaddress},#{mdatailedaddress},#{mnote})
mapper.select: SELECT MID FROM MEMBERSHIP WHERE MID = #{mid}
